{{Infobox Album | Name = The Undiscovered Numbers & Colors | Type = EP | Artist = [[Foreign Objects (band)|Foreign Objects]] | Cover = The Undiscovered Numbers & Colors.jpg | Released = October 1, 1995 | Recorded = {{Start date|1995}} at Trix Trax Studios, Malvern, Pennsylvania | Genre = [[Experimental Metal]], [[Melodic Death Metal]], [[Technical Death Metal]], [[Math Rock]] | Length = 13:58 | Label = Distant Recordings | Producer = [[Deron Miller]], [[Jess Margera]] | Last album = | This album = '''''The Undiscovered Numbers & Colors'''''
(1995) | Next album = ''[[Universal Culture Shock/Undiscovered Numbers & Colors]]''
(1996) }} '''''The Undiscovered Numbers & Colors''''' is the debut [[extended play|EP]] by American [[experimental metal]] band [[Foreign Objects (band)|Foreign Objects]]. While it was popular locally, the EP never garnered the band any mainstream success. Originally released on October 1, 1995 by Distant Recordings, it was later reissued as part of the 2003 ''[[Universal Culture Shock/Undiscovered Numbers & Colors]]'' compilation, which itself was reissued as the first disc in the 2009 compilation by Distant Recordings, [[15 Years]]. The front cover art was largely designed by drummer [[Jess Margera]]. ==Track listing== {{tracklist | total_length = 13:58 | all_writing = [[Deron Miller]]; "Destination Undefined" co-written by [[Jess Margera]] | title1 = The Undiscovered Numbers & Colors | length1 = 3:02 | title2 = Far Cry Behind | length2 = 2:32 | title3 = The Other Side of the End of the Universe | length3 = 3:01 | title4 = Delve | length4 = 1:09 | title5 = Destination Undefined | length5 = 4:16 }} ==Personnel== ;Foreign Objects *[[Deron Miller]] – [[Singing|vocals]], [[guitar]]s, [[Bass guitar|bass]], [[synthesizer]]s, [[Record producer|production]], [[Audio mixing (recorded music)|mixing]] *[[Jess Margera]] – [[Drum kit|drums]], [[Backing vocalist|backing vocals]], production, mixing, [[graphic design]], [[layout]] ;Additional personnel *Bob Zeigler – [[Audio engineering|engineering]], production assistance, mixing assistance *Matt Wacik – engineering assistance *[[Howie Weinberg]] – [[Audio mastering|mastering]] *Vinnie Zambuto – graphic design, layout ==References== {{refbegin}} *{{cite web |url=http://www.ckyalliance.com/band/index.cfm |title=CKY - Then and Now |publisher=[[CKY (band)|CKY]] |accessdate=September 28, 2009 }} *{{cite web |url=http://inhifi.com/wiki/index.php/Universal_Culture_Shock/Undiscovered_Numbers_%26_Colors |title=CKY: In Hi-Fi - Universal Culture Shock/Undiscovered Numbers & Colors |publisher=CKY: In Hi-Fi |accessdate=April 9, 2010 }} {{refend}} {{reflist}} {{1990s-rock-album-stub}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Undiscovered Numbers & Colors}} [[Category:Foreign Objects albums]] [[Category:1995 EPs]] [[Category:Debut EPs]]
